cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("MidiTest")

include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED MidiTest_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "MidiTest_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

  "${MidiTest_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

)
